bug.author: zarzen
bug.description: The link belong to Installation section in README is not right. Current URL directs to http://neon.nervanasys.com/docs/latest/user_guide.html#installation. Hope you can fix. Thanks

comments.comment: Thanks, we'll fix this. Here is the link to the installation section: http://neon.nervanasys.com/docs/latest/installation.html
